text: Gjert Andersen (born 17 March 1947) is a Norwegian skier. He was born in Bærum and represented the club Stabæk IF. He competed in Nordic combined at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, and at the 1972 Winter Olympics in Sapporo. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bærum Category:Norwegian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Norway Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1972 Winter Olympics
title: Gjert Andersen
